name: Cannibal Crusher
description:
Cannibal Crusher is a top-down defense game, where you have to defend your unconscious friend from waves of hungry cannibals. After you kill one wave, a stronger one spawns, see what wave you can get up to. There are four difficulty settings: easy, normal, hard and extreme.

Leave me a comment of what you think of the game, it would be greatly appreciated :D
